Name: Cafe Sport
Review Text: This place is s gem of a Portugese restaurant. Frequented by Portugese diners which is always a good sign of authentic cuisine. The room is small...cozy...romantic.  Make reservations. Excellent service and food. Generous portions. The ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Sport
Review Text: Food quality mediocre. Specials menu written on a board on the floor moved around and placed in front of the table, in English. Waiter reads the menu for customers who do not speak English. Very unprofessional.

Name: Cafe Sport
Review Text: Delicious, quaint restaurant. A bit pricey for lunch but flavor, presence, waitress and establishment was very nice! Shrimp dish with chicken delish!!!!

Name: Cafe Sport
Review Text: The wait staff are rude. This restaurant is on restaurant.com but I was rudely informed they don‚Äôt accept restaurant.com coupons. The food is just fair. It used to be better and more plentuful

Name: Cafe Sport
Review Text:
Although their taps were dry .....only one Portuguese tap available served icy cold ....
Not an IPA....not hoppy....
Margarita well done,refreshing.....

Name: Cafe Sport
Review Text: I had a really good experience on my first takeout during COVID-19. The food was good and workers were courteous. I didn't even realize they were offering 25% off on all takeout orders, but told. Left all (discounts) in tip box to help out. ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Sport
Review Text: The food is the best Portugese I've had.  Paella was out of this world. The service was excellent. The other dishes my friends and family had were delicious,  they didn't stop raving about them. The owner Manny was very friendly and helpful in making our selections.

Name: Cafe Sport
Review Text: Recently moved to the East Williston area.  Originally from Newark, NJ..  So I love the Portuguese and Brazilian bar restaurant experience.  Walked into Cafe Sport to a half empty bar and dining room with my wife.  Was immediately asked if ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Sport
Review Text:
We had a communion party there, buffet style.
The food and service was amazing.
Love this place reasonably priced and delicious is always a great thing!!
so much food and different flavors /dishes to choose from.

Name: Cafe Sport
Review Text: When visiting here you must try the red sangria. It's strong, yet refreshing, and you can taste the fruits. I always come with the mindset set of trying something else, but I can't seem to get enough of their red sangria. ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Sport
Review Text: Amazing food.. every year we have New Years Day dinner. Year after year the service is impeccable , the dishes are so flavorful and authentic Portuguese cuisine. ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Sport
Review Text: Place is cozy with nice selection of foods.  My friend and i both ordered linguini with garlic shrimp.   Everything was prepared well and service was impeccable but sauce was a bit watery and not enough garlic in dish.   It was still good but had better elsewhere.  Portions were large.

Name: Cafe Sport
Review Text: The bolinhos de bacalhau are the best on Long Island. I‚Äôve tried many different places all over Long Island and these are by far the best that I‚Äôve tried, greatly recommend these to anyone looking for authentic Portuguese food.

Name: Cafe Sport
Review Text: I wouldn't  go back to this place ever again.  Service was terrible  food wasn't good. Shrimp and scallops was very small. They wouldn't honor a groupon I had that was about to expire. There are plenty more Portuguese restaurant in the neighborhood.  Leave this one off your list

Name: Cafe Sport
Review Text: Cafe sport has been here for years. Consistently good food. Servers are always warm friendly and go out of their way to make sure you enjoy your meal. Great drink deals . Nice crowd. Mixed age groups

Name: Cafe Sport
Review Text: They used to be better years ago. Ordered baked clams but all I've seen there was shrimp. Definitely needs improvement.

Name: Cafe Sport
Review Text: Salmon and veal both were very tasty.  Loved the decor with romantic paintings on the walls too.

Name: Cafe Sport
Review Text: We had the caterers come to our house in Mineola this past weekend and provide our guests with great food and service. Highly recommend and will certainly use again.

Name: Cafe Sport
Review Text: Ceasar salad crisp and refreshing. Filet mignon cooked like i like it. Salmon  cooked to a delicate doneness. Waiter attentive and accommodating. Desert rich and over the top chocolate with vanilla ice cream to cut the denseness.  Yum!

Name: Cafe Sport
Review Text: Very good service and AMAZING Portuguese fare. The white sangria was awesome. Paella Valencia to die for!

Name: Cafe Sport
Review Text: Great taste of Portugal. Great drinks great food. Small Resturant with a good size bar. I love that because it shows that they really focus on the food.

Name: Cafe Sport
Review Text: Nice and cozy but no overly fancy. The food is terrific and priced right. Great service too. Try the sangria,

Name: Cafe Sport
Review Text: Food very tasty and the quantity very large. Our waiter angel was very helpful in suggesting items.

Name: Cafe Sport
Review Text: The food was great, the portions were large and the service was excellent. Thoroughly enjoyed it.
